mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into commodity_reviews (commodity_id, grade, is_have_image, is_additional_reviews, reviews_by, reviews_time, content) values (#{commodityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{grade,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isHaveImage,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isAdditionalReviews,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{reviewsBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update commodity_reviews set commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_have_image = #{isHaveImage,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_additional_reviews = #{isAdditionalReviews,jdbcType=TINYINT}, reviews_by = #{reviewsBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reviews_time = #{reviewsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where reviews_id = #{reviewsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select reviews_id, commodity_id, grade, is_have_image, is_additional_reviews, reviews_by, reviews_time, content from commodity_reviews where reviews_id = #{reviewsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select reviews_id, commodity_id, grade, is_have_image, is_additional_reviews, reviews_by, reviews_time, content from commodity_reviews
